GSD.description:
xen/netfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.204 by commit 04945b5beb73019145ac17a2565526afa7293c14. For more details please see the references link.
